name: cyberdeck
description: Cross-platform CLI mod manager for Cyberpunk 2077

scripts.build:bundle: pnpm run build && pnpm run bundle
scripts.dist:create:linux: cp $(command -v node) bin/release/cyberdeck && pnpx postject bin/release/cyberdeck NODE_SEA_BLOB bin/cyberdeck-sea.blob --sentinel-fuse NODE_SEA_FUSE_fce680ab2cc467b6e072b8b5df1996b2
scripts.dist:create:mac: cp $(command -v node) bin/release/cyberdeck && codesign --remove-signature bin/release/cyberdeck && pnpx postject bin/release/cyberdeck NODE_SEA_BLOB bin/cyberdeck-sea.blob --sentinel-fuse NODE_SEA_FUSE_fce680ab2cc467b6e072b8b5df1996b2 --macho-segment-name NODE_SEA && codesign --sign - bin/release/cyberdeck
scripts.dist:create:win: node -e "require('fs').copyFileSync(process.execPath, 'bin/release/cyberdeck.exe')" && signtool remove /s bin/release/cyberdeck.exe && pnpx postject bin/release/cyberdeck.exe NODE_SEA_BLOB bin/cyberdeck-sea.blob --sentinel-fuse NODE_SEA_FUSE_fce680ab2cc467b6e072b8b5df1996b2
scripts.format: pnpm run prettier && pnpm run lint
scripts.format:fix: pnpm run prettier:fix && pnpm run lint:fix
